text: is a railway station in the city of Nagahama, in Shiga Prefecture, Japan, operated by West Japan Railway Company (JR West). ==Lines== * Hokuriku Main Line * Kosei Line ==Layout== The station has two island platforms serving four tracks. ==History== Ōmi-Shiotsu Station opened on 1 October 1957. ==References== ==External links== * JR West station information ==Adjacent stations== Category:Railway stations in Shiga Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1957
title: Ōmi-Shiotsu Station
